mapper.select:
SELECT ROUND(AVG(positionScore),1) AS avgPositionScore, ROUND(AVG(facilitiesScore),1) AS avgFacilitiesScore, ROUND(AVG(serviceScore),1) AS avgServiceScore, ROUND(AVG(hygieneScore),1) AS avgHygieneScore, ROUND(AVG(score),1) AS avgScore FROM itrip_comment
and hotelId=#{hotelId}
